import React from 'react'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "./Home.css"; import{Logo} from "../images/Netflix"; import {ConnectButton,Icon,Button,Modal,TabList,Tab} from 'web3uikit'; import{movies} from "../helpers/library"; import{useState} from "react"; const Home = () => { const[visible,setVisible]=useState(false); const[selectedFilm,setSelectedFilm]=useState(); return( <>

{movies[0].Description}

Movies
{movies && movies.map((e)=>{ return( { setSelectedFilm(e); setVisible(true); } }> ) }) }
{selectedFilm && (
setVisible(false)} isVisible={visible} hasFooter={false} width="1000px">
Year: {selectedFilm.year}
Duration: {selectedFilm.Duration}
Description: {selectedFilm.Description} Genre: {selectedFilm.Genre} Actor: {selectedFilm.Actors}
) }
) } export default Home;
